alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 6:07PM CDT until March 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 606 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Willis to near Pilot Point, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Whitesboro, Van Alstyne, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Whitewright, Gunter, Bells, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Eisenhower State Park, southern Lake Texoma, Lake Kiowa, Southmayd, Tioga and Sadler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
